long_description: An atlas and gazetteer with detailed maps and GPS grids for the entire state of Georgia. Covers all publicly-owned lands, as well as boat launches, campgrounds, hunting and hiking areas and more. Includes historic sites/museums, information centers, scenic drives and unique natural features. 60 quadrangular maps; each map comprises approximately 30 minutes longitude and 35 minutes latitude. One inch represents approximately 2.9 miles; scale is 1:182,000; includes GPS grids for use with a Global Positioning System receiver. DeLorme; copyright 2000.
short_description: An atlas and gazetteer with detailed maps and GPS grids for the entire state of Georgia.
